question: 出社
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>exit</kanji> somewhere in order to go to your <kanji>company</kanji>, that's <vocabulary>going to the office</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>arriving at the office</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>coming to work</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out for  the しゅつ, which gets changed to しゅっ, as many つs do in this situation.
